name: RTCDataChannel.bufferedamountlow_event
description: A bufferedamountlow event is sent to an RTCDataChannel when the number of bytes currently in the outbound data transfer buffer falls below the threshold specified in bufferedAmountLowThreshold.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
